name: Classic Pad Thai
author: Heinz
summary: This recipe is a perfect example of Thai cooking for beginners. Once mastered, you'll forget stopping for take-out and make this easy stir-fry a weeknight staple.
ingredients: 8 ounces medium width rice vermicelli noodles
½ pound peeled, deveined raw shrimp
½ cup vegetable or chicken broth
¼ cup fresh coriander or parsley leaves
directions: Cover noodles with boiling water and let stand for 5 minutes; drain well and reserve
Heat half the oil in a wok or deep skillet set over high heat
Crumble in chicken and add hot sauce; stir-fry for 3 to 5 minutes or until browned
Add remaining oil and peppers to pan; stir-fry for 3 minutes
Add shrimp and stir-fry for 2 minutes
Stir in garlic, ginger, broth, ketchup, lime juice, sugar and fish sauce
Add noodles and reserved meat; toss mixture to combine
Sprinkle with onions, coriander and peanuts
